description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing extension)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 321/01 Site Location Plan, 321/02 Proposed block plan, 321/03 Ground floor plan as existing, 321/04 First floor plan as existing, 321/05 Loft plan as existing, 321/06 Section A-A as existing, 321/07 side (north) elevation as existing 321/08 Rear elevation as existing, 321/09 Section B-B as existing, 321/10 Side (south) elevation as existing, 321/13 Ground floor plan as proposed, 321/14 First floor plan as proposed, 321/15 Loft plan as proposed, 321/16 Side (north) elevation as proposed, 321/17 Rear elevation as proposed, 317/18 Section B-B as proposed, 321/19 Side (south) elevation as proposed, 320/20 section X-X as proposed, Design and Access Statement dated February 2025.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
